title: This is how you do a Halloween update
body:
[](http://media.steampowered.com/apps/tf2/screamfortress7/images/bg_01.jpg)[This is how you do a Halloween update.](http://www.teamfortress.com/screamfortress7/)

Not only is there free stuff for grabs, but also optional cosmetics that can be bought or traded for.

######Shame they forgot to give 5/9 classes any individual cosmetics. Fuck you, Scout, Engineer and Pyro.
